QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Kun-Lai Summit!
QuestData.Description:
All able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to assist Lorewalker Cho in Kun-Lai Summit.
Speak with a messenger grummle in Valley of the Four Winds. They will show you the way to Kun-Lai Summit.
Glory to the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to the Messenger Grummle in Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to the Messenger Grummle in Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: Traveling to Kun-Lai? Right this way, wanderer, right this way!
